title: stuffed squid with sage, potatoes, peas, capers and aïoli
description: Chorizo and squid are a winning combination and even more delicious when cooked in a buttery sage sauce and served with garlicky aïoli.Equipment and preparation: You will need five cocktail sticks, cut in half and soaked in cold water, for securing the squids.
ingredients: ½ garlic clove, very finely chopped
1 tsp white wine vinegar, plus extra to taste
3 spicy parrilla cooking chorizos, peeled and chopped finely
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
